name: items
func:
var regi = [
    ["V1      "],
    ["V2      "],
    ["V3      "],

    ["A1      "],
    ["A2      "],
    ["A3      "],

    ["kW1     "],
    ["kW2     "],
    ["kW3     "],

    ["kvarL1  "],
    ["kvarL2  "],
    ["kvarL3  "],
    
    ["kvarC1  "],
    ["kvarC2  "],
    ["kvarC3  "],

    ["kVA1    "],
    ["kVA2    "],
    ["kVA3    "],

    ["PF1     "],
    ["PF2     "],
    ["PF3     "],

    ["CosPhi1 "],
    ["CosPhi2 "],
    ["CosPhi3 "],

    ["kWIII   "],
    ["kvarLIII"],
    ["kvarCIII"],
    ["kVAIII  "],
    ["PFIII   "],
    ["CosPhiII"],

    ["Hz      "],

    ["V12     "],
    ["V23     "],
    ["V31     "],
    
    ["AN      "]];
msg.payload = regi;
return msg;

name: Tables Styles
format:
<style>
    #table {
    //    font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
        border-collapse: collapse;
        width: 90%;
    }

    #table td,
    #table th {
        border: 1px solid #ddd;
        padding: 0px;
   }

    #table tr:nth-child(even) {
        background-color:#f2f2f2 ; //green
    }

    #table tr:hover {
        background-color: #ddd;
    }

    #table th {
        padding-top: 5px;
        padding-bottom: 2px;
        text-align: center;
        background-color: yellow ;#04AA6D
        color: white;
    }
</style>
